header.title: About GenMedia Creative Studio
header.introduction:
Welcome to GenMedia Creative Studio, an application showcasing Google Cloud's Vertex AI Generative Media models. This tool is designed to provide a hands-on experience with our powerful APIs for image, video, and music generation.

GenMedia Creative Studio is available on our [Vertex AI Creative Studio github repo](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-creative-studio/tree/main/experiments/veo-app) for you and customers to install.

sections.title: Imagen
sections.description:
The **Imagen** page allows you to generate images from text prompts. You can control various parameters like aspect ratio, style, and content type.

**Available Models:**
*   Imagen 3 Fast
*   Imagen 3
*   Imagen 4
*   Imagen 4 Ultra

[Learn more about Imagen on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/image/overview)

sections.title: Veo
sections.description:
The **Veo** page is for video generation. You can create videos from a text prompt (text-to-video) or animate an existing image (image-to-video).

**Available Models:**
*   Veo 2
*   Veo 3
*   Veo 3 Fast

[Learn more about Veo on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/video/overview)

sections.title: Lyria
sections.description:
The **Lyria** page lets you generate musical scores. Provide a prompt describing the mood, genre, or instruments you want to hear.

**Available Models:**
*   Lyria

[Learn more about Lyria on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs/generative-ai/audio/overview)

sections.title: Virtual Try-On
sections.description:
[Virtual Try-On](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/generate-virtual-try-on-images) is a fully managed Vertex AI service to generate images of persons modeling fashion products.

**Virtual Try-On** brings Google's advanced image generation technology to developers and retail customers in the fashion industry. This experimental service provides an easy-to-use API and cutting edge quality for generating shots of models trying-on products.

With Virtual Try-On, you can create high quality listing photos with just an image of a person and a product to try on. Supported products are:
 * Tops: shirts, hoodies sweaters, tank tops, blouses
* Bottoms: Pants, leggings, shorts, skirts
* Footwear: Sneakers, boots, sandals, flats, heels, formal shoes

This workflow allows you to see how a piece of clothing looks on a person. You provide an image of a person and an image of a garment, and the model generates a new image of the person wearing the item.

sections.title: Product in Scene
sections.description:
**Imagen Product Recontext** brings Google's advanced image generation technology to developers and retailers for generating product images. This service provides an easy-to-use API and cutting edge quality for generating shots of products in new scenes and contexts.

With Product Recontext, you can create high quality listing photos with just an image of a product and an optional text prompt. Supported product categories are:
* Appliances
* Business and industrial
* Clothing
* Electronics
* Furniture
* Garden and yard
* Hardware
* Health and beauty
* Jewelry
* Pets
* Shoes
* Sporting goods
* Toys and games
* Vehicle

This workflow, also known as Product Recontextualization, allows you to take a product image and place it in a new scene. You provide an image of the product and a text prompt describing the new scene, and the model generates a new image of the product in that scene.

sections.title: Motion Portraits
sections.description: This workflow allows you to animate a still image of a person. You provide an image of a person and a text prompt describing the desired motion, and the model generates a short video of the person moving.

sections.title: Character Consistency
sections.description: This workflow allows you to generate a consistent character across multiple images. You provide one or more reference images of the character along with a the scene description for the character, and the model generates a series of images of that character in different poses and settings, chooses the best one that aligns with the reference images, and then creates a video of that character in the new scene.

sections.title: Feedback
sections.description: We're always looking for feedback, comments, and feature requests, please [fill out this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeGyKL468Eam3PUfyV8R5I0g3iGc7_zuL87eimw4HITUYlUrw/viewform?usp=sharing).
